title: SEAFORT ORB / fairweather t500 helmet
description: Orb that checks how much armour you've collected after you pick up the helmet.

dialogueTree.title: Endurance: "Brother, you've managed to collect..."
dialogueTree.text: Brother, you've managed to collect all the armour pieces. Too bad it's too late for the big showdown.

links.title: You: "Don't think this helmet would have..."
links.text: Don't think this helmet would have helped me anyway. (Look down at your wound.)

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It would have looked very impressiv..."
links.text: It would have looked very impressive... Still. You found it all. Now your mortal coil is  *completely* protected. Few cops are this futuristic.

links.title: You: "At least now I am truly invincible...."
links.text: At least now I am truly invincible. [Leave.]

links.title: You: "At least my collector's impulse has..."
links.text: At least my collector's impulse has been satisfied.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Indeed. You found it all. Now your..."
links.text: Indeed. You found it all. Now your mortal coil is  *completely* protected. Few cops are this futuristic.

links.title: You: "I'm sure I'll have a use for this a..."
links.text: I'm sure I'll have a use for this armour in the future.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Future use for a future armour. Agr..."
links.text: Future use for a future armour. Agreed. Gear up, heavy porcelain man. It's a violent world.

dialogueTree.title: Physical Instrument: "Son, you found another piece of the..."
dialogueTree.text: Son, you found another piece of the armour puzzle. Too bad it's too late for the big showdown. And also too late to collect all of them and have a full set.

links.title: You: "Don't think this helmet would have..."
links.text: Don't think this helmet would have helped me anyway. (Look down at your wound.)

links.title: Physical Instrument: "But it would have looked really imp..."
links.text: But it would have looked really impressive.

links.title: You: "And maybe scared the enemy combatan..."
links.text: And maybe scared the enemy combatants...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Exactly. But no use crying over spi..."
links.text: Exactly. But no use crying over spilt milk. Keep up the pace. Only forward.

links.title: You: "Can't do anything about it now."
links.text: Can't do anything about it now.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "That's a good attitude to take. I l..."
links.text: That's a good attitude to take. I like it. Keep it up, and keep the helmet handy.

links.title: You: "I never cared about collecting the..."
links.text: I never cared about collecting the full set. I'm not the collector type.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Yeah, sure, but you would have beco..."
links.text: Yeah, sure, but you would have become nearly invincible.

links.title: You: "I'll make do. [Leave.]"
links.text: I'll make do. [Leave.]

links.title: You: "Damn. Perhaps another day. [Leave.]"
links.text: Damn. Perhaps another day. [Leave.]

links.title: You: "Hey, at least I've got this cool he..."
links.text: Hey, at least I've got this cool helmet *now*. I can wear it into the next battle.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "I'm liking the positive attitude. K..."
links.text: I'm liking the positive attitude. Keep it up, champ.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]
